file_content.text: There has to be something. The Elysium wasn't burned to the ground. Check again.
But I've been through there twice already. Almost got captured by Ulgo troops once.
All House Thul brought to Parliament was the Empire. We had no proof of our claim.
Until those Ulgo pretenders invaded, yes. They turned that meeting into a bloodbath.
Search the ruins again. Come back with proof or don't come back at all.
